------
i think for something that has run super hard (i.e. from $4m to $150m in ~2 weeks) there will be a cool down at some point before an eventual, more explosive leg up

i mean for memecoins, especially one that has rallied with many being sidelined, it's generally bullish to shake off a bit of unbelievers who are up a lot before a more super aggressive move to higher, insane valuations

it's hard to say exactly when this would happen though, because many expected a pull back way before the current levels, and even though i have very optimistic targets for USELESS, even i did not expect it to just go on a 'no breaks' pump from $4m to $150m in just a few weeks tbh

what i'm super confident about, regardless of short term moves, is that this is eventually a billion dollar memecoin

i'm saying this based on the memetics, lore, group of core holders, as well as other on-chain metrics (which Nansen, Stalkchain, and Sunflow have been talking about a lot recently)

i also know from being close to the CTO team that T1s and CEXs have taken active interest in this one and discussions are ongoing; ofc it's hard to say where discussions end, but there's a level of interest from them that seems unusual this early for a memecoin

then you have:

- other form of engagements from respectable CEXs that are not t1s: Kraken Co-CEO and a listing manager publicly memeing it just last week, Crypto.com listing it organically yesterday (they rarely do this!), Kucoin listing for free, etc
- confluence from a lot of savvy memecoin guys, including those early to WIF and Fartcoin
- it being the first solid memecoin to come out from the trenches since TRUMP; i can't think of anything that has been sticky since then
- way too many people getting sidelined on this rally; this is evident on CT, even in the trenches, etc (many will try to position on the next significant pullback)
- the fact that a higher market cap makes it more interesting i.e. a $500m 'USELESS coin' is more memeable than a $100m USELESS coin, for example. good case in point is the convo involving [redacted] in this chat the other day: smart folks are naturally going to get triggered by this doing insane valuations when it's hard for 'good stuff' to get funding and traction, and that will only fuel press which helps it. it should also fuel industry wide criticism at some super high valuation, for many reasons but more so for the fact that it is 'insulting' and 'ridiculous' that some memecoin deriding the entire industry as USELESS is trading 'THAT HIGH!!!'
- i should also add that Wintermute recently reached out to me highlighting its strength; i never pitched it to them and haven't had discussions with them in ages. knowing how they operate, the fact that they reached out indicates that they're seeing interest in it from big money or CEXs

USELESS coin has all of the ingredients of a blue chip memecoin

and interestingly every single WIF OG i've seen in it do not just believe it has ingredients of a 'wif style' move, but they actually think it has potential for a higher ceiling compared to wif... because the meme is 'not as niche' compared to WIF

so, i do think this has all the ingredients

even more so because it had a lot of buzz when it first came out and CT did a whole circus around it when it retraced 90% from $40m to $4m, denouncing it as dead, only for it to pull a 3,000% move from $4m to $150m... so even if it does get a significant pullback, i don't think anyone will consider it 'dead' this time around. people will simply find an opportunity to position and the FOMO from the next move will be more than the current one

that being said, i do personally think a scenario in which it gets a form of pullback + consolidation before the next leg up will be bullish for a few reasons:

- it gets more power brokers in; so much salt from sidelinoors rn, so it doesn't hurt if a few get a good entry that allows them to push it hard since they would have vested interests
- it should result in a lot of 'new money' that are up 1,000% to 3,000% getting out now which should create less resistance in the future
- it makes a statement about the longevity of the memecoin: 'it keeps surviving major corrections'

i've seen a few comments suggest that my post yesterday (quote tweeted) was me fudding #USELESS coin

on the contrary, my post has actually demonstrated the following:

1. USELESS remains the strongest memecoin in the market right now: some wallets started dumping after my tweet, and one even full-stacked a massive amount of tokens that crashed the price 15% in one clip. guess what happened? his dump was insta-bought back above the pre-sell price in mere seconds

2. USELESS rapidly gained hundreds of new holders who absorbed the large sell-offs triggered by initial sell pressure

3. USELESS hit a new ATH mere hours after my original post, which many claimed was “FUD” that induced selling

4. USELESS has held stronger than any other major memecoin through the memecoin bloodbath happening today (don’t take my word for it, see the attached screenshot!)

5. USELESS has proven it doesn’t rely on just one man to succeed. it’s a strong narrative rapidly gaining traction, and a much bigger idea than just me. there’s a lot of smart money and heavyweights watching it, and even if i were to stop pushing it for whatever reason (i won’t, God willing!), someone else will likely pick up the baton and run harder

don’t get me wrong, i do not in any way underestimate my influence:

i know i’ve gotten a lot of people into USELESS, but things have only worked this well because the narrative is strong and sticky. it wouldn’t have done quite as well if it was some dog poo narrative

and i’m sure more big accounts will start popping up to talk about it as they notice its consistent relative strength (many have been DM’ing me saying they’re accumulating it as their biggest high-conviction memecoin play, fwiw)

some people also insinuated that i posted yesterday’s tweet because i wanted to sell

i’m not sure if that’s because they have a reading comprehension issue, but i never said or implied anything close to that

many people trust and follow my takes, some blindly, and i felt i owed it to them to be factual and transparent: anything that rallies super aggressively in a short time can have a pullback before the next leg up

i was clear that i didn’t know when that pullback might happen, but some interpreted it as me calling a local top... which is strange!

many strong memecoins in the past have gone from nothing to billions in weeks, so just because i said there might be a pullback eventually doesn’t mean it will happen now

if you believe in the narrative and don’t have exposure, the best way to enter is to DCA, rather than FOMO buy what you think might be a local top or wait for a dip that may never come at the levels you're watching

anyway, my USELESS-related tweets are not for short-term traders. they’re for people who have vision and believe in the narrative!

just as i said yesterday, some weak hands tried to make my post a self-fulfilling prophecy... but they greatly underestimated USELESS coin’s strength, and i’m glad everyone got to watch that play out in real time

i also want to make it very clear: i have not sold a single USELESS token, and i do not intend to sell until we get clear PVE and it becomes a unicorn (i.e. billions)

of course, if needed, i’d be happy to contribute some of my tokens to support listings on T0/T1 CEXs (several of which, from what i understand, are actively engaging the CTO team right now)

i bought a bit on the way down when everyone lost hope—mainly on my public wallet, but also a few on non-tracked ones (not impossible to track, but i won’t be sharing to avoid botting by copytraders like on my main one)

i also have a USELESS perps trade open on WOOFi Pro and Raydium (both powered by @OrderlyNetwork). i haven’t mentioned this before because every time i do, i get accused of pumping my positions—so i stopped announcing most of my new perps trades

i opened this leverage long around $40m market cap. i could only use a little over $20k in margin because it's illiquid and they capped my long size. i'm up over 1,000% on that trade (see screenshot). i’ll likely rotate it into spot soon since the funding is eating into my gains

i don’t know how orderly calculates funding, but longing USELESS has become prohibitively expensive on the platform—so i’m considering moving it to spot. and even that rotation should be bullish, since futures/perps don’t require holding the asset, while spot adds real, trackable buy pressure.

to conclude:

USELESS has had the best relative strength among memecoins today. it’s a bigger narrative than i, and i haven’t sold a single token despite being up massively on both my spot and perps holdings!

이번 사이클에서도 똑같은 일을 하고 있습니다… 다만 이번에는 모두의 눈앞에서 공개적으로, 실시간으로 진행 중입니다.

저는 밈코인을 오랫동안 다뤄오며 이제 폭등할 코인을 직감으로 알아차리는 일종의 육감이 생겼습니다.그뿐만 아니라, 저는 폭발적이고 주류적인 성공을 거둘 밈코인의 공식을 완성했습니다.

내러티브? 이 코인은 말 그대로 쓸모없는 코인입니다.  암호화폐의 99%가 그렇듯이 말이죠. 하지만 이 코인은 잔인할 정도로 솔직합니다.  시가총액이 높아질수록 내러티브와 잠재력은 더 강해집니다.

거래량? USELESS 코인은 오늘 DEX에서 5,050만 달러 이상의 거래량을 기록하며, 시가총액 10억 달러 이상인 $FARTCOIN과 $TRUMP를 제외하고 온체인에서 세 번째로 많이 거래된 밈코인입니다.

 이달 내내 USELESS는 매일 4,000만~6,000만 달러의 온체인 거래량을 꾸준히 유지했습니다.

새로운 밈코인이 모든 체인에서 $TRUMP와 $FARTCOIN을 제외한 모든 밈코인을 제치고 평균 5,000만 달러의 일일 온체인 거래량을 기록하는 게 우연이라고 생각하시나요?

지난주 Bybit에서 USELESS의 퍼프(perpetual futures) 상장이 갑작스럽고 자연스럽게 이루어진 걸 많은 이들이 보았습니다. 

그건 단지 첫 번째 도미노였습니다. 

바이낸스, 코인베이스, 로빈후드, 업비트 등은 결국 이 코인을 상장할 겁니다. 
이런 거래량은 중앙화 거래소(CEX)가 무시하기엔 너무 강력합니다.
관심도? USELESS 코인은 관심을 끌어들이는 자석입니다. 

가격 움직임에 놀라움을 표하거나, 강한 비판을 쏟아내거나, 승리를 응원하거나, 크립토 트위터(CT)는 이 코인에 대해 이야기하는 걸 멈출 수 없습니다. 이건 CT에서 시작되었지만, 곧 틱톡, 인스타그램, 그리고 주류 미디어로 퍼질 겁니다.

유휴 자본? USELESS 코인은 올해 최고의 성과를 낸 밈코인입니다. 

한 달 조금 넘는 기간 동안 7,700% 상승했지만, CT의 90%는 이 코인을 극도로 싫어하거나 완전히 외면하고 있습니다. 저는 밈코인을 많이 겪어봤지만, USELESS 코인처럼 이 정도 수준의 외면과 억눌린 에너지를 가진 코인은 처음 봤습니다. 
이건 제가 충분히 낙관적이지 않다는 느낌마저 들게 합니다.

컬트 커뮤니티? USELESS 코인 커뮤니티는 남다릅니다. 심지어 Coindesk조차 이걸 ‘최신 크립토 밈코인 컬트’라고 인정해야 했습니다.

USELESS 코인은 $DOGE, $SHIB, $PEPE, $FARTCOIN 등이 초기에 폭발하며 수십억 달러 시가총액에 도달하고 10억 달러 이상을 꾸준히 유지했던 바로 그 요소들을 모두 갖추고 있습니다.

하지만 이 코인에는 그들이 가지지 못했던 한 가지가 더 있습니다: CT에서 나오는 믿을 수 없을 정도로 강렬한 억눌린 에너지와 코프(cope).

펀더멘털은 USELESS 코인이 수십억, 아니 수백억 달러로 갈 수 있도록 완벽히 맞춰져 있습니다.저는 이런 패턴을 수많은 밈코인에서 보았고, 항상 결과는 똑같았습니다 : 수십억 달러.

저는 USELESS 코인이 수십억 달러에 도달할 것이라는 확고한 믿음을 가지고 있습니다.

시가총액 1,000만 달러 미만일 때도 저는 이를 외쳤습니다.

1억 달러에 도달했을 때 사람들이 ‘1,000% 오른 코인을 팔로워들에게 홍보한다’며 비웃었을 때도 외쳤습니다.

2억 달러에 도달했을 때 사람들이 ‘다음 상승 전에 5,000만 달러로 조정될 것’이라 확신했을 때도 외쳤습니다.

3억 달러에 도달했을 때, 그리고 그 이후 몇 차례 2억 달러로 하락했을 때 사람들이 이 코인이 끝났거나 대규모 조정이 올 거라 확신했을 때도 외쳤습니다.

그리고 지금, 3억 2,000만 달러에 이르렀을 때, 다음 단계인 10억 달러 시가총액으로 가기 직전에 다시 외치고 있습니다.저는 완전히 믿습니다. 

USELESS는 사이클이 끝나기 전에 상위 5대 밈코인이 될 것이며, 10억 달러 이상으로의 랠리는 많은 이들이 예상하는 것보다 훨씬 빠르고 공격적으로 이루어질 것입니다.

إن شاء الله

よく「なぜ#USELESSコインにそんなに強気なのですか？」と聞かれます。

理由は簡単です。

ファンダメンタルズは嘘をつきません。

私は数々のミームコインのサイクルを経験してきました。

2021年のミーム株ブームでは、$DOGEがゼロからスタートし、時価総額900億ドルに達するのを目の当たりにしました。

また、$SHIBがDogeの劣化版と思われていた状態から430億ドルに急騰し、一時的にDogeを追い抜くのも見てきました。

$SHIBの後継として登場した$FLOKIは、初期の開発者に遅れをとりましたが、CTOチームが引き継ぎ、わずか数か月で35億ドルまで急成長しました。

$BONK、$PEPE、$WIF、#FARTCOIN… まだまだあります。

私はこれらの激しい変動を、現場の最前線からリアルタイムで目撃してきました。

前回のサイクルでは、無名のミームコインで7桁、8桁（ドル）の利益を何度も上げました。

それでも、気に入らないことを言うとすぐに「ボンクはただ一度成功した幸運なバカだった」という話を広めようとする人がいます。

しかし実際は、前回のサイクルで、私はほぼゼロから、ここで言及することさえ恐れるほどの金額を築き上げました（ここで開示した最高の利益でさえ、実際の金額に比べれば微々たるものです）。

そして今、私はそれを再び、完全に公開し、リアルタイムで、皆の目の前で行っています。

ミームコインを極限まで追求することで、直感的に「これは成功する」と判断できる第六感のようなものを身につけました。

そして今、私は「ミームコインが爆発的に成功するための条件」を正式に言葉で表現できるようになりました。

しかし、USELESSコイン以外では、ここ数年、その条件を完全に満たすミームコインに出会ったことはありません。

---

ナラティブ？

仮想通貨の99%は実際には「役に立たないコイン」です。USELESS Coinは、この事実を露骨に認めているだけです。時価総額が高ければ高いほど、ナラティブは強力になり、説得力も増します。

流動性？

DEXScreenerによると、USELESS Coinは複数のプールを通じ、1,150万ドル以上のDEX流動性を有しています。現在の時価総額でこれほどの流動性を持つミームコインは稀です。

取引量？

本日、USELESS CoinはDEX取引量で5,050万ドル以上を記録し、$FARTCOINと$TRUMP（いずれも時価総額10億ドル以上）に次いで、オンチェーン・ミームコインの中で3番目に取引量の多いコインとなりました。

今月の大半において、オンチェーンの1日あたりの取引量は4,000万ドルから6,000万ドルの間で推移しています。

偶然でしょうか？

新しいミームコインがオンチェーンで毎日平均5,000万ドルの取引高を記録し、あらゆるチェーン上で3番目に取引量の多いミームコインとなっています。これは偶然とは思えません。

Bybit上場？

先週、USELESSがBybit Perpetualに突如上場しましたが、これはドミノ倒しの始まりに過ぎません。Binance、Coinbase、Robinhood、Upbitなど、他のCEXも順次上場する予定です。

これほどの取引量であれば、どのCEXも無視することはできません。

注目？

USELESSコインは話題を呼ぶ存在です。暗号通貨関連のTwitterでは、衝撃的な話題が飛び交い、人々は驚きの声を上げ、嫌悪感や批判の声を上げ、そして歓声を上げています。

このブームはCT（暗号通貨関連Twitter）で始まりましたが、まもなくTikTok、Instagram、そして主要メディアにも広がるでしょう。

サイドラインファンド？

USELESSコインは今年最も好調なミームコインです。わずか1ヶ月強で7,700%も上昇しました。

それにもかかわらず、暗号通貨関連のTwitterユーザーの90%は依然として「嫌悪」か「完全に様子見」の姿勢です。

ミームコインは数多く見てきましたが、これほど強い「様子見」のエネルギーを感じたのは初めてで、私自身もまだ強気ではないと感じています。

カルトコミュニティ？

USELESSコインのコミュニティは他のコミュニティとは一線を画しています。Coindeskでさえ、これを「最新の暗号通貨ミームカルト」と認めざるを得ませんでした。

USELESSコインには、$DOGE、$SHIB、$PEPE、$FARTCOINなどが爆発的な上昇を遂げる前の要素がすべて備わっています。

そして、USELESSコインにはなかったもう一つの非常に強力な要素があります。それは、暗号通貨関連のTwitterユーザー全体からの途方もない「拒絶」と「嫉妬に満ちた様子見」です。

ファンダメンタルズを見れば、USELESSコインは「10億ドル」に達する運命にあることは明らかです。

私は過去に、数え切れないほどのミームコインで、まさに同じシナリオを何度も見てきました。

そして結果は常に同じでした――

「数十億ドル」に到達することです。

時価総額が1000万ドルに満たなかった頃から、私はこのことを叫び続けてきました。

1億ドルに達した時も、「1000%上昇したコインをフォロワーに売っている」と揶揄された時も同じでした。
